data.name: Tooltips_Crit_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Critical Hit{@Clear} affects the rate at which your attacks and heals can critically hit as well as the damage dealt and HP restored by a critical hit.
Critical Hit Rate and Damage increase by 0.1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Determination_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Determination{@Clear} increases damage dealt by attacks as well as HP restored by healing actions.
Determination's effect increases by 0.1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Direct_Hit_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Direct Hit Rate{@Clear} affects the rate at which your attacks can direct hit. A direct hit increases damage done by 25%.
Direct Hit Rate increases by 0.1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Skill_Spell_Speed_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Skill/Spell Speed{@Clear} shortens cast times and recast timers as well as increase damage done by damage over time effects.
A 2.5s GCD is sped up by 0.01s on average every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Skill_Spell_Speed_DoT_Increase
data.value: DoT damage increases by 0.1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Spell_Speed_28_GCD
data.value: A 2.8s GCD is sped up by 0.01s on average every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Next_Tier
data.value: To reach the next tier you need {@Highlight}{NextTier}{@Clear} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Expected_Damage
data.value:
Average damage of a 100 potency skill, including critical and direct hits as well as passive traits such as Maim and Mend.
A normal attack will do {@Highlight}{NormalValue}{@Clear} damage. A critical hit will do {@Highlight}{CritValue}{@Clear} damage.
Damage always has a variance of ±5%.

data.name: Tooltips_Expected_Heal
data.value:
Average HP restored by a 100 potency healing action, including critical hits as well as passive traits such as Maim and Mend.
A normal heal will restore {@Highlight}{NormalValue}{@Clear} HP. A critical hit will restore {@Highlight}{CritValue}{@Clear} HP.
HP restored will always vary by ±3%.

data.name: Tooltips_Tenacity_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Tenacity{@Clear} increases damage dealt and HP restored by your own actions as well as reducing damage taken.
Tenacity's effect increases by 0.1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Piety_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Piety{@Clear} increases the amount of MP gained per server tick (every 3s). By default you will gain 200 MP per tick.
Piety gives 1 extra MP every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Defense_Tooltip
data.value: {@Title}Defense{@Clear} reduces physical damage taken by 1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Magic_Defense_Tooltip
data.value: {@Title}Magic Defense{@Clear} reduces magic damage taken by 1% every {PointsPerTier} points.

data.name: Tooltips_Vitality_Tooltip
data.value: {@Title}Vitality{@Clear} increases max HP by {HpPerPoint} every point. As a {Job} you have {BaseHp} base HP.

data.name: Tooltips_Main_Stat_Tooltip
data.value:
{@Title}Main Stat{@Clear} increases damage dealt as well as HP restored by your actions. An increase of 10% main stat constitutes a 10% increase in damage and healing.
SMNs physick is the only exception since it scales with MND instead of INT.

data.name: Config_Override_default_tooltips_tooltip
data.value: Override the default tooltips for all stats.

data.name: Config_Window_Use_Game_Language_Tooltip
data.value: Use the internal game language for this plugin if available. Currently Available: English, German, French

data.name: Config_Help_Apply_Changes
data.value: To apply any config changes you must reopen the character panel.
